file_content.text: I'm not sure how to explain this on the insurance claim....
Is it done? Did you thoroughly decon the lab?
You're safe.
Whatever research you were doing, stop. Those creatures were monstrosities!
Nothing could be worth that.
We had expressed some concerns to upper management about the direction the experiments were going....
Perhaps we'll turn our research to counter-bioweapon applications. I've seen some of what the Imperials are testing....
It's done. Pay me.
Of course. I'll arrange a transfer... the rest of our grant money. We'll be writing the whole thing off to insurance anyway.
Thank you. Without your quick work, all of Nar Shaddaa might have fallen to the plague.
Please hurry. If the lab isn't decontaminated, who knows how quickly the virus might spread.
Don't go in there!
Wait! I know you. I've seen your faces. Maybe you could help before this gets out.
Oh! Master Jedi! Thank goodness you're here. You're exactly who we need to deal with this mess before it goes public.
Oh! You're Republic military, right? Thank goodness you got here before this went any further.
Wait. Are you...? You look familiar. Have you done work for the Republic? Or would you be willing to now?
I'm the chief scientist at ChemFlex. Our rival Xenobi sent a sabotage team to--forget the details. We've got hundreds of lab animals loose down there!
What animals? Are they dangerous?
Lab animals?
I'm here for you.
Just contain the whole place. Kill everyone in it. They're all infected by now....
I'm not getting involved in your internal corporate rivalries.
Sounds like a private matter.
I wouldn't ask you to. But this threatens the whole planet.
We've been working with biotoxins, viruses native to Nar Shaddaa that are highly communicable and lethal to every sentient species we've tested.
If they escape, it could cause a pandemic... and if the press learns the Republic's doing bioweapons experiments....
I will make sure nothing spreads this plague.
We cannot risk it.
Thank you, Master Jedi. Your compassion is legendary.
I expect to find unethical human experiments in an Imperial lab, not one of our own.
The Republic should stop.
We tried to keep the protocols humane. But when Xenobi attacked... everything in there is infected by now.
I'll handle your cleanup... and make a full report to High Command.
Let's keep that classified.
I understand. Do what you have to.
I haven't heard the words "great reward," once yet.
What's in it for me?
I'll pay you the remainder of our grant from the project. Just please hurry.
You have something in mind?
Xenobi's thugs are still in there. They're almost certainly infected by now.
I have just enough inoculation doses left to protect you from the virus. Once injected, you can enter the lab without fear of contagion....
Once you're in, kill anything alive, then release the decon spray hoses. It's the only way to cut our losses now.
Forget it. [Refuse quest]
I was hoping you'd see reason.
I knew doing delicate research on Nar Shaddaa would backfire on us....
Thanks again. But if you run into any Imperials, we never met, right?
Hey, Doc Rassan, your friend is back.
Hey, Doc Rassan, your friends are back.
If you'll excuse me, I must return to the lab. This is going to involve a lot of paperwork.
Thanks a lot. The doc's maybe a little focused on his work, but he's a good guy, really. Some of the boys will get him to the lab safe.
How's that "favor" coming?
Friends. I take it we have a common enemy, and maybe a common friend. You're with the Republic, eh?
Master Jedi? First, can I just say what a great honor and privilege it is to meet a Jedi?
You're Havoc Squad, aren't you? My old man was a Republic grunt. The stories he told....
Friend. I've seen you doing work for the Republic.
I'll make this quick. A friend of mine needs help. Urgent-like.
He's a Republic scientist. Empire trashed his lab. Me and the other workers are hiding him here, but we can't keep him safe forever. The Imperials are getting suspicious.
I'll do my duty.
I like to think I'd do the same in your shoes.
Make it quick.
You won't regret it.
I'll see what I can do.
Doc Rassan. You can come out. These folks are on our side.
Doc Rassan. You can come out. He's on our side.
Doc Rassan. You can come out. She's on our side.
Thank you, Greggo. And thank you.
I'm chief scientist at ChemFlex doing research for the Republic. Or I was. I doubt that will hold true now.
The Empire found out about us. They sent thugs to sabotage--forget the details. We've got hundreds of lab animals loose down there! I barely escaped with my life!
Sounds like sick experiments.
Your concerns are merited, I'm afraid.
If they escape, it could cause a pandemic... but that's nothing compared to what will happen if one of the Empire's thugs manages to escape with the formula.
We tried to keep the protocols humane. But when the Empire attacked... everything in there is infected by now.
The Empire's thugs--of course they didn't send their own soldiers--are still in there. They're almost certainly infected by now.
Better get going. We can't let the Empire catch the doc here.
Come on, friend. Please give it another thought. We have to stop the Empire.
Look, if the Empire catches me talking to you....
